title: Adventure Learning-Based Language Competency Enhancement Course: Cultural Exploration and Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and practical experience in the field
context.additional_context: Practicing professionals collaborating in real-time via online platforms and accessing diverse language learning content through digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will achieve at least 80% proficiency in communicative competence considering cultural contexts in the target language through adventure learning scenarios by Week 4
Learners will perform virtual exploration activities (e.g., online cultural experiences) at least once weekly to derive practical language application examples
Learners will self-evaluate their degree of change in language use attitudes on a 5-point scale by synthesizing peer and instructor evaluations at the course conclusion
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
